snippet: The United States national team dissembled Guatemala on Tuesday night, advancing to the final round of qualifying matches in their region for the 2014 World Cup.
abstract: United States national soccer team defeats Guatemala, 3-2, to advance to the final round of regional World Cup qualifying.
lead_paragraph: The United States national team dissembled Guatemala on Tuesday night, advancing to the final round of qualifying matches in their region for the 2014 World Cup.

headline.seo: U.S. Advances to Final Round of World Cup Qualifying
headline.main: Confident U.S. Swaggers Past Guatemala in Qualifier
headline.print_headline: U.S. Coasts to a Victory, Restoring Its Confidence and Reaffirming Its Status
